rows.label: bf03180150_0010
rows.name:
Incredible.
Never heard of such a thing.

rows.label: bf03180150_0020
rows.name: It's all true.

rows.label: bf03180150_0030
rows.name: I just thought it was an accessory.

rows.label: bf03180150_0040
rows.name: Vandham, that's not my style.

rows.label: bf03180150_0050
rows.name:
Blades are supposed to heal up right
away, no matter what the wound.

rows.label: bf03180150_0060
rows.name:
If the crystal's in one piece and the
Driver's alive, nothing can touch 'em.

rows.label: bf03180150_0070
rows.name: So why's she all bashed up?

rows.label: bf03180150_0080
rows.name:
That's just how the chips fell.
It is what it is.

rows.label: bf03180150_0090
rows.name: What it is, is a problem.

rows.label: bf03180150_0100
rows.name:
It means, if one of you kicks the
bucket, you both do.

rows.label: bf03180150_0110
rows.name: You told me that a good Driver always protects his Blade.

rows.label: bf03180150_0120
rows.name: So that's what I'll do. I'm gonna protect her.

rows.label: bf03180150_0130
rows.name: Easier said than done, kid.

rows.label: bf03180150_0140
rows.name: Listen.

rows.label: bf03180150_0150
rows.name:
I've decided that I won't die again,
for Homura who gave me this life.

rows.label: bf03180150_0160
rows.name: I won't die. And we'll certainly reach Eden,

rows.label: bf03180150_0170
rows.name: together.

rows.label: bf03180150_0180
rows.name: Rex, you mean...

rows.label: bf03180150_0190
rows.name:
Going to Eden? I can't let that
stand.

rows.label: bf03180150_0200
rows.name:
It won't do.
A bunch of amateurs stealing the show?

rows.label: bf03180150_0210
rows.name: You're ruining the script.

rows.label: bf03180150_0220
rows.name: Yoshitsune!

rows.label: bf03180150_0230
rows.name: Don't use my name, traitor.

rows.label: bf03180150_0240
rows.name: Traitor traitor traitor!â™ª

rows.label: bf03180150_0250
rows.name:
Nia, you're one of the baddies now.
You villain!

rows.label: bf03180150_0260
rows.name: Teeheehee!

rows.label: bf03180150_0270
rows.name: I didn't betray anyone!

rows.label: bf03180150_0280
rows.name:
Then why do you stand with them?
You think that is where you belong?

rows.label: bf03180150_0285
rows.name: But, I...

rows.label: bf03180150_0290
rows.name: Hmph. Who are these goons?

rows.label: bf03180150_0300
rows.name: Iira. They're trying to get their hands on Homura.

rows.label: bf03180150_0310
rows.name: Iira?!

rows.label: bf03180150_0320
rows.name:
Yoshitsune!
Just tell us what you're here for!

rows.label: bf03180150_0330
rows.name: Well, the Holy Grail, of course.

rows.label: bf03180150_0340
rows.name:
I just had to come and see the leading
lady with my own eyes.

rows.label: bf03180150_0350
rows.name: Shin put you up to this?

rows.label: bf03180150_0360
rows.name:
Well deduced.
Oh, by the way...

rows.label: bf03180150_0370
rows.name:
His orders were to deal with you
in whatever manner I see fit.

rows.label: bf03180150_0380
rows.name: So you know what that means.

rows.label: bf03180150_0390
rows.name:
He wouldn't...
You're lying!

rows.label: bf03180150_0400
rows.name:
Why the surprise?
Did you think he would still care about you?

rows.label: bf03180150_0410
rows.name: Oh, to live in your reality...

rows.label: bf03180150_0420
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Grrr!

rows.label: bf03180150_0430
rows.name:
Well, well. Your part in this play is
coming to an end.

rows.label: bf03180150_0440
rows.name: So! Time for you to shuffle off the stage.

rows.label: bf03180150_0460
rows.name: Hnngh!

rows.label: bf03180150_0470
rows.name: What's wrong?

rows.label: bf03180150_0480
rows.name:
I know the name Iira. They've taken
the lives of too many Drivers.

rows.label: bf03180150_0490
rows.name: Including some of my crew. Good people.

rows.label: bf03180150_0500
rows.name:
Rumor says it's because they're collecting
Core Crystals. So, if this Yoshitsune is one of them...

rows.label: bf03180150_0510
rows.name: Yew! Zuo! Get everyone out of the village!

rows.label: bf03180150_0520
rows.name: Yes, sir!

rows.label: bf03180150_0530
rows.name: You ready?

rows.label: bf03180150_0540
rows.name: Ready!

rows.label: bf03180150_0550
rows.name: Got it!

rows.label: bf03180150_0560
rows.name: Thanks for this.

rows.label: bf03180150_0570
rows.name: No problem!

rows.label: bf03180150_0580
rows.name:
It'll be tough. His Blade, Kamui...
She can manipulate the ether in the air.

rows.label: bf03180150_0590
rows.name:
It lets him counter elemental attacks by
generating fields of the opposing element!

rows.label: bf03180150_0600
rows.name:
Finally, a decent opponent for a change!
Let's go!
